title: X-Press Pearl Fire Could Mean Environmental Disaster For Sri Lanka
content:
1. X-Press Pearl Fire Could Mean Environmental Disaster For Sri Lanka  NPR
  2. Environmental Disaster Feared After Burning Cargo Ship Sinks Off Sri Lanka  Bloomberg Quicktake: Now
